description: This file defines the interface IAppManager and its notification structure within the WPEFramework. It declares functions for managing applications such as launching, loading, closing, and querying app properties, as well as handling app lifecycle events via notifications.

classes.name: IAppManager
classes.description: Interface for managing applications, providing methods for app lifecycle control, property management, and event notifications.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving application lifecycle events such as installation, uninstallation, state changes, and launch requests.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification listener for app events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a notification listener.

methods.name: GetLaunchableApps
methods.description: Retrieves a list of apps that can be launched.

methods.name: GetLoadedApps
methods.description: Retrieves a list of currently loaded or running apps.

methods.name: LaunchApp
methods.description: Launches an app with the given ID and intent.

methods.name: LoadApp
methods.description: Loads an app into memory without launching.

methods.name: PrepareApp
methods.description: Prepares an app for launch.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: Sends a message to a specified app.

methods.name: CloseApp
methods.description: Closes a running app.

methods.name: TerminateApp
methods.description: Terminates an app forcefully.

methods.name: ClearAppData
methods.description: Clears stored data for an app.

methods.name: SetAppFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to a specific app.

methods.name: GetAppMetaData
methods.description: Retrieves metadata for an app.

methods.name: GetAppProperty
methods.description: Gets a specific property of an app.

methods.name: SetAppProperty
methods.description: Sets a property for an app.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveApps
methods.description: Gets the current maximum number of inactive apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Sets the maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedApps
methods.description: Gets the current maximum number of hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Sets the max flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: GetMaxHibernatedFlashUsage
methods.description: Gets the max flash usage for hibernated apps.

methods.name: SetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Sets the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

methods.name: GetMaxInactiveRamUsage
methods.description: Gets the maximum RAM usage for inactive apps.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
